title: Cloud-Based Architectural Design Studio: Strengthening Design Competencies via Real-Time Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Architectural Terminology and Understanding of Design Processes
context.additional_context: An environment where practicing professionals perform project-based learning using cloud design tools on mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can share design ideas using three or more collaboration tools on a cloud-based platform.
Learners can iteratively revise their designs at least twice through a real-time feedback system and submit the final version.
Learners can apply three spatial organization principles through communication with peers and instructors during virtual critique sessions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
